meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>inflation</kanji> of <kanji>boil</kanji>ing water means that bubbles are being inflated in there and bubbling to the top. This is called <vocabulary>boiling</vocabulary>, or if it's happening in a person it's called <vocabulary>seething</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
